channel.title: Miscs on Hugo NexT

item.title: Hugo_setup
item.description: hugo nexT主题： https://github.com/hugo-next/hugo-theme-next/releases hugo工具： https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases 创建站点 hugo new site site_name cd site_name git init 将主题hugo-theme-next放置到themes文件夹下 拷贝主题中examp
